betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe following contellations can be used to add a second attunement to a crystal, to modify its ritual effects.

Alcara: corrupts the ritual, and gives an opposite effect.

Gelu: increases range, but lowers speed.

Ulteria: increases speed, but lowers range.

Vorux: increases range and speed, but the crystal has a chance of breaking.
